column4: hi! I have question: is there a chance add packages subversion-1.6.x for 8.04 LTS in backports? I see that there is 1.5.x, who is responsible for this package?
your best bet is to see if they have a PPA
PPA? Could you explain what's mean? :)
its a repository that has newer software than the baseline ---- basically you add it to synaptic and then can get the newer versions
Do you suggest to find repo for this package and add into synaptic?
even jaunty is still at 1.5 -- are you sure 1.6 is stable?
yes, I tried find it. In official version is 1.4.x subversion, on backports there is 1.5.x, and I hope that there will be 1.6 too ;)
do you want SVN or CVS ?
you'll have to compile it yourself, jaunty (newest devel version) is still sitting on 1.5.4
yes, because version 1.6 is fresh (it was released some days ago)
so just wait and see - or compile it yourself
yes, I'll wait some day, maybe there will be available for 8.04
